## SearchConfig type

The main configuration options for [SearchCore](./anguyen-search-core-testt.searchcore.md)<!-- -->. For a full description of the options, see [BaseSearchConfig](./anguyen-search-core-testt.basesearchconfig.md)<!-- -->. The config requires either an apiKey or a token.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type SearchConfig = SearchConfigWithApiKey | SearchConfigWithToken;
```
